E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1988
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
The time has come. I'll leave the show after this year.
I guess I will have to make room for the young players.

Sincerely,
Andres Echeverria



Date: Thursday, 4/24/1988
Subject: Billy Plath healing process
Billy Plath is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 6/2/1988
Subject: Jerome Norman learns new position
Jerome Norman has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Leftfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Saturday, 6/14/1988
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Lou Collins



Date: Monday, 8/18/1988
Subject: Joey Torres learns new position
Joey Torres has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Rightfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director
